Scriptal.Name: Custom Event Trigger
Scriptal.Description: Immediately triggers a custom 'Mission' StrCode32 event. This can be used for daisy-chaining events together, or creating an event loop.

Choice.Name: Message
Choice.Description: The name of the event Message. This operation triggers an event to occur. You can catch that event By creating a new script with a "Mission" StrCode, and this value as the message.

Choice.Name: Argument 1
Choice.Description: The first arg sent from the trigger. This can carry over the original event arg1 or a custom value.

Choice.Name: Argument 2
Choice.Description: The first arg sent from the trigger. This can carry over the original event arg2 or a custom value.

Choice.Name: Argument 3
Choice.Description: The first arg sent from the trigger. This can carry over the original event arg3 or a custom value.

Choice.Name: Argument 4
Choice.Description: The first arg sent from the trigger. This can carry over the original event arg4 or a custom value.
